title: Can not access remotely
text:
I now have the same issue as the above reviewer. No off-site, remote, connectivity. I too have T-Mobile, and lost the remote connectivity with the latest update. It’s a great product, I have several cameras in my home. Notifications and snapshots still get through, but no live streaming off-site. 

Sort of defeats the whole purpose of the app. I don’t need live streaming in my own home! I need to be able to check on my home while away. 

This live streaming used to work great with the old version. Please fix it!!

Thank you!

title: Started out great but terrible investment now
text: I bought 2 cameras through their kick starter campaign on indiegogo.  At first, sounded like a great investment, and it did worked for some time... but then a year ago the camera started to act weird.  I can’t view or access it through my T-Mobile service. I can ONLY view, access the camera via WiFi.  This happened a year ago and it was fixed.  BUT this week - out of nowhere - I can’t access my camera again through my phone unless I’m on WiFi. Seriously???! Again?!? Doesn’t it render this security camera useless while I’m on the go? Ugh. Feels like I now wasted $299 for a “half-cooked” idea.

title: It was great.
text: The camera and app are very nice. The one thing that has become a very big problem is that I am no longer able to user the app when I am no home/in network. The issues seem to be the fact the my carrier T-Mobile has switched my internet connection to ipv6 from ipv4 and for some reason the app or camera is not compatible with Ipv6, but this is only a guess as I can get  solid answer. Please fix this. It's been along and we need out of network viewing.

title: Fast response from developers
text:
Fast response from developers. This tells me they are proactive in fixing any issues and these cameras will be a long term investment.  So I changed my review to full 5 stars as they truly deserve it. 
The tech in these cameras are above all the others.

Any chance for fixing the issue yet?

title: Fast and informative
text: Setup of the cameras was relatively easy, especially given the multiple options for connecting them to WiFi. It was easy to train them to recognize familiar faces, and I was impressed with their responsiveness and quickness in spotting movement and people! I imagine the premium recognition options are equally good.

title: Good quality
text: We have a few cameras, but AR3S truly stands out. It’s well built and allows both wired or wireless connectivity. The camera’s casing is made of aluminum, and provides a good shield to withstand a wide temperature range. The auto tracking feature is useful to follow all the activity in my home.

title: Amaryllo Apollo camera is terrible
text: Either the Apollo camera, this app, or both are causing a repeated issue of not loading live camera view.  The loading % gets stuck at 40%, and if not that, an error message when clicking on camera settings prevents me from rebooting the camera.  I have this Apollo camera installed on the ceiling with the included mount.  This is annoying to have to physically get a ladder, unplug, and power cycle this repeatedly.

title: Fix needed
text: After this update when the cameras are in privacy move it is greyed out and cannot be turned back on or off.

title: Good value
text: I have a few kind of security cameras in my Vegas home, but Amaryllo cameras provide both security and good quality to us. I will recommend them to my friends.

title: App not Google verified for several months
text: App still says that it is not Google verified so I cannot get my camera to store video recordings on Google Cloud drive.  I’m not interested in paying extra for storing on your cloud.  Camera is basically useless now.

title: Bad Icon
text: The inverted colored icon is harder to see. I like orange background but the thin borders of the white logo are not contrasting enough. Either make a solid logo or a black logo with a more pastel colored background.

title: It was nice, but now it’s trashcam!
text: At the beginning (Kickstarter), it was a pretty good product. Then, impossible to login when outside without the same WiFi network as the camera. Then.., no more free recording and inclunding in the first offer. Then..., stopped working. Don’t buy for sure!

text: App is not perfect but keeps improving .

title: Great improvement to original isensor app
text:
I've previously written that I believe this app-hardware product to be about the best-designed system in its field.

This new app allows more than 4 sensors.  But if you already use the older app, you need to remove it and then reboot each sensor.  After that you follow the instructions as though each camera was a new device... (Don't hit the "change wifi" button by mistake.)

Now, the options are presented as a horizontal scrolling tape across the lower part of the screen.

Amaryllo offers a cloud storage plan for a monthly service fee. Personally, I have no use for that plan, unless it can offer me something besides simple on-line storage at rates comparable to the usual providers.  I am assured that Amaryllo will continue to support the basic free Google-like cloud plan.  I just hope that none of these people are from Microsoft marketing.
........
Mauibob ( a recovering engineer)

P.S. "Marcus" from support is a Godsend! If he leaves Amaryllo, then I want to know where he winds up, so I can buy that product!!

title: Suggestion for Upgrade
text:
Hello,

I am a user of iCam 360. I will like to suggest that the app should also be able to function such that a users can access the CAM memory via wifi to playback recordings made by the CAM. Some of us do not always have available internet data to Acess the cloud so our only option is to remove the memory from the CAM and play the recordings on other device. It will be very useful to all users if you integrate the wifi playback acess tool.

title: IR finally works
text: This latest firmware finally fixes the camera's ability to focus with IR, and it zooms with a doubletap! Previously my icam360 was a blurry mess at night--I assumed the LEDs weren't functioning.

title: Great App to go with GREAT iCam
text: Just installed 2 iCamPROs and they work flawlessly. I have tried to make several IP cams work and these really do!! Lots of great features!!!

title: simplest setup with the new update
text: Love the new app upgrade with facial recognition. It's fun to play with.

title: Works Well
text: Straightforward setup. Works well.

title: No access without wifi and delayed notifications
text: With the latest iOS app version (1.5.3.7545) and firmware (4.1.2) my iSensor refuses camera access when not connected to wifi. Error message is "an error occurred while accessing the server (100)". This is a huge problem. Also, notifications seem significantly delayed than previously experienced. I don't know what Amaryllo is up to with these recent app and firmware releases but they are rendering the camera useless when not on wifi (which is most of the time while out of the house).
